itunes:title: Episode 703 - Dirty Jersey In The House!
title: Episode 703 - Dirty Jersey In The House!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by a couple of New Jersey first responders who stopped by the studio and ended up on the show!  We asked them everything about what it's like working shifts as a cop and a paramedic in Jersey City, Dan explains ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by a couple of New Jersey first responders who stopped by the studio and ended up on the show!  We asked them everything about what it's like working shifts as a cop and a paramedic in Jersey City, Dan explains to them why he hates Bruce Springsteen, the fascination with Wawa, who has the best pizza, and why the girl of their dreams was an epilepsy patient.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by a couple of New Jersey first responders who stopped by the studio and ended up on the show!  We asked them everything about what it's like working shifts as a cop and a paramedic in Jersey City, Dan explains to them why he hates Bruce Springsteen, the fascination with Wawa, who has the best pizza, and why the girl of their dreams was an epilepsy patient.
